column4: I am using ubuntu on a dell inspiron laptop, and i think that power management is causing the computer to drop the cable connection after a while. how do i fix this?
seveas what is acpi? and how do i set that?
I'd be fairly surprised if power management caused that
it can't cause ethernet card to shut off on a laptop?
I really doubt that is your issue
youu don't have a C compiler because yo udidn't read the FAQ and install one
eh? as I said, instal build-essential
it's now known as oldstable and only has a year or so of security fixes left
